text: Valentina Ivanovna Matviyenko (n√©e Tyutina, born 7 April 1949), is a Russian politician who was Governor of Saint Petersburg from 2003 to 2011. She is Chairman of the Federation Council since 2011. She is the highest-ranking female politician in Russia. == Notes == == Other websites == * Valentina Matvienko is in Lentapedii Category:Members of the Federation Council (Russia) Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Saint Petersburg
title: Valentina Matviyenko
